headline: Dover Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Dover Corporation (NYSE: DOV) today declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.515 (fifty-one and one-half cents) per share, payable on March 14, 2025, to shareholders of record as of February 28, 2025.
